text: the child just 10 or 11 years old is the
latest porn in a brutal insurgency it's
not clear exactly how old she is birth
certificates are rare here but Afghan
officials say her brother that Taliban
commander gave her a suicide vest
telling her to blow up a police station
her brothers are here and his friend
forced her to wear the vest but when she
saw the river she was going to have to
cross it looked cold and she said she
couldn't once back at home she claims
her father beat her so she ran away and
gave herself up to the police the use of
female suicide bombers remains rare here
in Afghanistan even more so the use of
children the last similar case anyone
can think of it was in 2011 when an 8
year old girl was given a bomb to carry
to a police car blew herself up it has
aroused a sense of deep revulsion across
Afghanistan with many saying it shows a
sense of desperation amongst the Taliban
it was shocking in the family also like
my girls were shocked in the committee
in the parliament today the whole MPs
were talking about it it's very in a way
that this actually happens by the
brother you know how much brutal a
brother could be to promote her his
sister to commit a suicide bomber it
indicates that despite the fact that
many people talk about possible change
in the perspective of the Taliban still
that change has not come the story is
also being used in the war of words
between the Afghan government and the
Taliban and what will happen to the
little girl caught in the middle isn't
yet clear though the Afghan authorities
have described her as an innocent child
who should be treated as such Caroline
what BBC News Kabul
